Class LeaveOnTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.Transition
      • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions.Event

                • fr.lri.swingstates.canvas.transitions.LeaveOnTag

  • public class LeaveOnTag
extends MouseOnTag
    A transition triggered when the cursor leaves a CShape with a given tag.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

      • LeaveOnTag

        public LeaveOnTag(java.lang.String tagName)
        Builds a transition triggered when the cursor leaves with any modifier a tagged shape. This transition loops on the current state.
        Parameters:
        tagName - The name of the tag

        public LeaveOnTag(java.lang.String tagName,
          int modifier)
        Builds a transition triggered when the cursor leaves a tagged shape. This transition loops on the current state.
        Parameters:
        tagName - The name of the tag
        modifier - The modifier: NOMODIFIER, CONTROL, ALT, SHIFT, ALT_CONTROL, CONTROL_SHIFT, ALT_SHIFT or ALT_CONTROL_SHIFT
